channel.title: CVE Feed for Tarteaucitron -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tarteaucitron -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36887|2024-09-16T18:49:40.416Z -- tarteaucitron -- tarteaucitron.js%20%E2%80%93%20cookies%20legislation%20%26%20gdpr%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability leading to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) discovered in tarteaucitron.js – Cookies legislation & GDPR WordPress plugin (versions <= 1.5.4), vulnerable parameters "tarteaucitronEmail" and "tarteaucitronPass".

item.title: CVE-2021-36889|2024-09-16T18:08:38.643Z -- tarteaucitron -- tarteaucitron.js%20%E2%80%93%20cookies%20legislation%20%26%20gdpr%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Stored Authenticated Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities were discovered in tarteaucitron.js – Cookies legislation & GDPR WordPress plugin (versions <= 1.6).
